page.title: 07A Housing Estate in S.Albans
page.content: {New Greens estate}lies in the north of the city of St.Albans and is bounded by the{A6,}a golf course,a wood and a private estate.The {housing on the estate varies in different areas in that some houses have larger gardens and rooms than others. There are {3 playgrounds or parks,} two of which contain childrens' play equipment.There are plenty of {bus {stops}dotted around the estate and the {service}is reasonable, a bus arriving every {20 mins.}New Greens is fairly tidy and shopping facilities are quite good, though there is neither a chemist's nor a butcher's shop,which makes life more difficult for{elderly {people,}of whom there are over{200.}By New Greens Avenue is a small new housing development.Harpenden Road is very busy always,more so now the{M1 {traffic}is being directed through it.
